S01khasrpsu:2_0: iha śubhaṅkaranāmā upāsakaḥ śubhakarmakārī karuṇāyamānaḥ sa kila potalakagamanodyataḥ /
S01khasrpsu:2_3: mā gaccha tvam ihāsmān vairocanābhisaṃbodhitantrarājakrameṇa sthāpaya tena mahān satvārtho bhaviṣyati /
S01khasrpsu:2_5: ity eṣā śrutiḥ / tatra bhagavataḥ sādhanāya dṛṛṣṭisaṃpattiḥ kriyate /
S01khasrpsu:3_0: varaṃ bhikṣoḥ śīlavipattir na punar dṛṣṭivipattir iti /
S01khasrpsu:3_1: atas tatra tāvat kṣaṇikān nirātmakān sarvadharmān vyavalokya vyapagatasakalavikalpaḥ kṛpāśayo 'ho vatāmī satvāḥ kleśakarmādibhir upadrutāḥ /
S01khasrpsu:3_2: tato jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhair (Khs_12) atīva pīḍyamānāḥ santo 'nekaprakāraduḥkham anubhavanti /
S01khasrpsu:3_3: tato 'haṃ lokeśvaro bhūtvā teṣāṃ duḥkhādy apanayāmi /
S01khasrpsu:3_5: ity evaṃ pratijñāśayaṃ kṛtvā svahṛdi paṃkārajasahaśradalapadmavarāṭakamadhye akārajacandramaṇḍalopari āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ iti pañca bījāni vinyasya /
S01khasrpsu:3_6: etadraśmimālābhiḥ sañcodyānīya tān gurubuddhabodhisatvān gaganatale purovartinaḥ kṛtvā vandanāpūjāpāpadecanātrisaraṇagamanādisaptavidhāṃ pūjām ekadaśadhāṃ vā kṛtvā maitrīkaruṇādicaturbrahmavihārī bhāvanāṃ kuryāt tataḥ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'ham ity uccārya śūnyatābodhim kṛtvā bhagavān avalokiteśvaro yoginātmanā bhūyate /
S01khasrpsu:3_7: sa ca śaraccandragauraḥ / jaṭāmakuṭī śirasi amitābhadhārī sarvālaṅkārabūṣitaḥ /
S01khasrpsu:3_13: tadanu sadhanakumārah / kanakojjvalaḥ / ratnābharaṇo ratnamukuṭī vāmakakṣāvasaktamalikaḥ /
S01khasrpsu:3_15: mūrdhni caityālaṅkṛtā / kanakojjvalā / raktavastraparidhānā / dakṣiṇahastena namaskāraṃ kurvāṇā /
S01khasrpsu:3_20: saparivāraḥ / pūjayitavyo 'py evaṃvidhaḥ / tataḥ kṛtamaṇḍale / tatrādau maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā rakṣāṃ kuryāt /
S01khasrpsu:3_21: (Khs_13) oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi rakṣa o māṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
S01khasrpsu:3_23: / oṃ āgaccha bhagavan maṇḍalakasiṃhāsane oṃ āḥ iti mantrakṛtādhyeṣāṇāyāṃ kṛtamaṇḍalamadhyasiṃhāsanopari sahasradalapadmasthapañcātmakam pūjayed iti /
S01khasrpsu:3_24: tatra pūjāmantraḥ / oṃ vajrapuṣpe hūṃ / oṃ vajradhūpe hūṃ / oṃ vajragandhe hūṃ / oṃ vajrāloke hūṃ / oṃ vajrāhāre hūṃ / iti saṃpūjya saṃstutya mantrajāpam kuryāt /
S01khasrpsu:3_26: pūjādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ // oṃ āṃ tāṃ suṃ bhṛṃ haṃ phaṭ svāhā /
S01khasrpsu:3_27: / oṃ sarvatathāgatasulalitanamitair namāmi bhagavantaṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ pratīccha kusumāñjalir nātha hoḥ /
S01khasrpsu:3_28: iti vandanāmantraḥ / oṃ muḥ svāhā iti visarjanamantraḥ /
S01khasrpsu:3_29: oṃ kha kha kha hi / gṛhṇa gṛhṇa gṛhṇa ntu sarvabhautikā imaṃ baliṃ svāhā /
S01khasrpsu:3_30: iti balimantraḥ / atha pūjārambhakāle evam uccārya cittaṃ śodhanīyaṃ /
S01khasrpsu:3_34: yady evaṃ na kriyate / tadā rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ syāt /
S01khasrpsu:4_1: dveṣajena rāgeṇa mohajena vaiśravaṇo yakṣo bhūtaḥ /
S01khasrpsu:5_0: ity ato rāgadveṣamohādīn parihṛtya cittaśuddhyā karuṇāyamānacittena sarvāṇy eva dānādikuśalamūlāni kartavyāni /
